On your Ciclo HAC bike computer, activate Bluetooth and select your phone. Once connected, you’ll see komoot’s navigation instructions on your Ciclo HAC’s display when navigating a route.

Open the komoot app on your Panasonic e-bike. Tap on \'Connect Phone\' and then tap \'Connect\'. Once connected, you’ll see komoot’s navigation instructions on your Panasonic e-bike when navigating a route.

On your +STROMER- e-bike, activate Bluetooth and select your phone. Once connected, you’ll see komoot’s navigation instructions on your device\'s display when navigating a route.
If you disconnect from this device, you’ll no longer see komoot’s navigation instructions on its display. You can reconnect to it again at any time in komoot.

Get to know where people ride, run, and hike, and explore your own activity patterns. ��
• {bold}Anonymised activity:{/bold} Global Heatmaps show areas where the Komoot community has been most active—always anonymously.
• {bold}Privacy zones:{/bold} Any part of an activity within your privacy zones is completely excluded.
• {bold}Start/finish trimming:{/bold} We automatically remove the first and last few hundred metres of every activity, even outside privacy zones.
• {bold}Minimum activity threshold:{/bold} A segment only appears when multiple activities from several different users overlap, ensuring no individual activity can be identified.
• {bold}Private activities excluded:{/bold} Activities set to Only you are never included in Heatmaps.
• {bold}No live or identifiable data:{/bold} Heatmaps update over time but never show real-time or personal information.
• {bold}Full control:{/bold} You can adjust your Heatmap visibility anytime in your Privacy Settings.
• {bold}Low-activity areas:{/bold} Places with little or no recorded activity may appear with faint or no heat.
Before you explore Heatmaps, here’s what to keep in mind:
See where the komoot community runs, rides, and hikes most often. Brighter lines reflect higher activity, helping you find popular routes or discover quieter alternatives.
{link_learn_more}Click here{/link_learn_more} to know more about heatmaps.

If the repair shop is closed, AXA Assistance will cover the cost of a night’s accommodation so you can sleep soundly until you’re back on the road.
Whenever you need assistance or want to make a claim, AXA Assistance is never more than a phone call away: any time, any day — even as the clock strikes midnight on New Year’s Eve.
Once you’re covered, all you have to do is call AXA Assistance to make a claim — any time, any day. They’ll then process your claim immediately and work to get it settled as soon as possible.
If your bike or e-bike can’t be fixed, you’ll be reimbursed for the cost of a rental, up to the value of €350 per week.
Convenient coverage in Europe, the USA and Canada

Be it your skis, your bike or even a surfboard — you’re covered up to the value of €1500 when your gear gets stolen or irreparably damaged in-flight during a journey (at least 100 km from your place of residence).

The outdoors is an unpredictable place — no matter how well you plan. That’s why we’ve teamed up with AXA Assistance to build a unique protection plan exclusive to komoot Premium: So you can better enjoy your experiences outdoors, safe in the knowledge that you’re insured against practically every eventuality — from flat tires and broken chains to full search and rescue teams.
Premium protection — explore with peace of mind
Explore in total confidence with premium protection
If you can’t continue, AXA Assistance will organize transport to a destination of your choice within 50 kilometers—be that your home, your route’s endpoint or a train station.
Ripped sidewall? Broken derailleur? When something breaks, all you have to do is call AXA Assistance. They’ll then send out someone to fix your gear or get you to the nearest repair shop.

If you get lost whilst on a journey (at least 100 km from your place of residence) and need a helicopter to airlift you out, we’ll cover the cost of a search and rescue team anywhere in the world — up to the value of €15,000.

We believe that going further is about a mindset, not miles. It’s the grin before the final ascent; it’s taking the unknown instead of the well-trodden. It’s celebrating the moments that don’t quite go to plan while soaking in the ones that do. Tried anything new lately? We have.
Show “What’s New” posts in my Discover feed.

Because the best things in life are simple, we’ve combined all of the stuff you love into a brand-new, awesome discovery feed. Just scroll to see your friends’ latest activities, to browse your region’s most exciting activities, and to discover hand-picked Collections just for you.
Introducing the new home of inspiration

Not sure where to go on your next hike, ride or run? Check out our brand-new route recommendations, based on the best community-recommended Highlights. Just select your sport, search for an area, and find awesome routes at the tap of a button.
Check out what\'s new on komoot. %s

There’s a whole world of adventure out there—and it starts right at your door. To help you better make the most of it, we’ve improved our route search to include hikes, rides and runs that start at your current location or any address you search for. So your adventures can start the moment you step outside.
Find routes that start where you are

We’ve given our app for Wear OS a major overhaul to make it more reliable, more powerful and easier to use. Get komoot on your watch now — and explore more of the great outdoors at the flick of a wrist.
Introducing our new app for Wear OS
